summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the coordinated regulation of the grading, excavation and filling of Land and the Control of Storm Water Runoff; providing for grading permits and drainage control plans; providing penalties for violation; declaring dysfunctional drainage control facilities and certain unauthorized excavation and fills a nuisance; amending Section 7000 and repealing Sections 7001 through 7009 of Ordinance 106350 (Building Code) and repealing Ordinance 107378 (Grading Ordinance).
